title: go.tools/ssa: ssa panics on blank "ok" in comma-ok select clause
body:
Steps to reproduce:

     1. Run ssadump -build=F repro.go[0]
     2. There is no step 2.

    [0] http://play.golang.org/p/H3T_pwRTzg

What is the expected output?

    Not a panic.

What do you see instead?

    "panic: blank.typ is unimplemented"
